product_name: Horny Toad Coral T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made for everyday wear, the women's Horny Toad Coral T-shirt has a scallop detail at the back hem and a coral print across the left side that sets you apart from all the other fish in the sea. Cotton blended with Tencel(R) lyocell and spandex is textured for softness next to skin and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable. The women's Horny Toad Coral T-shirt features a rounded V-neck.
short_description: Made for everyday wear, the women's Horny Toad Coral T-shirt has a scallop detail at the back hem and a coral print across the left side that sets you apart from all the other fish in the sea.
